titles.title: Renewable Chemicals Parity Act of 2013
To provide biorefinery assistance eligibility to renewable chemicals projects, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: 6/18/2013--Introduced. Renewable Chemicals Parity Act of 2013 - Amends the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to make biorefinery assistance available for renewable chemicals projects. Defines "renewable chemical" as a monomer, polymer, plastic, formulated product, or chemical substance produced from renewable biomass. Extends mandatory and discretionary funding for biorefinery assistance through FY2018.
